name: Smith Squad Mag Goggles - Unisex
description: A semi-rimless design and Smith’s largest cylindrical lens to date combine to give you a massive field of view, so trees can’t blindside you. All styles include a bonus lens, letting you customize your outlook for the conditions.Designed for medium to larger faces.ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions.Fog-X anti-fog inner lens, helps keep your vision clear.Cylindrical Carbonic-X lens with TLT optics provide crisp detail edge-to-edge.Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight.Lightweight urethane frame provides a comfortable fit for a wide variety of face shapes.3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal.Strap has silicone strips to keep it in place.Includes a spare ChromaPop Storm Rose with 50% visible light transmission.Includes an extra lens and a microfiber goggle bag.
